Pahāsati，令人笑。in pahāsanto saparisaṁ at ThA．69 should preferably be read as pahāsayanto parisaṁ，thus taken as Caus．of pa+has，i．e．making one smile，gladdening．
Pahāsati，in pahāsanto saparisaṁ at ThA．69 should preferably be read as pahāsayanto parisaṁ，thus taken as Caus．of pa+has，i．e．making one smile，gladdening．（Page 448）
